Class ec.ezlib.base.StringSugar

public class StringSugar
extends Object
A sweetener defining extra messages that may be e-sent to a string.

OTHER_TYPE

add(String, String)
Enables EZ's "+" do do what Java's does
includes(String, String)
Convenience method,especially to make simple examples look less intimidating to the beginner.
lessThanOrEqualTo(String, String)
EZ's <= on strings is first resolved case-independently, and then case-dependently to break ties.
lines(String)
Breaks the string up into separate lines of text, each terminated by a '\n', except possibly the last.
multiply(String, int)
("ab" * 3) == "ababab"
